Inky Wrapper.description:
Inky Wrapper 

 Wrapper creates the necessary structure to wrap elements so that full width backgrounds can applied. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/wrapper.html

Inky Container.description:
Inky Container 

 All emails should have a container element. This gives the email a maximum width for email clients on larger screens. It also orients the email in the center. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/grid.html#container

Inky Row.description:
Inky Row 

 A row is a <table> with a <tbody> and <tr>. Inside of this <tr>, you'll place each individual column. The <table> also has the class .row. 

 https://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/grid.html#rows

Inky Columns.description:
Inky Columns 

 Inside of the <th> is another full table. The content of your column goes inside of a <th>. Right below that table header should be another <th> with a class of .expander. This empty element helps the column expand to be full-width on small screens. 

 https://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/grid.html#columns

Inky Button.description:
Inky Button 

 Buttons are convenient tools when you need more traditional actions. To that end, Foundation has many easy to use button styles that you can customize or override to fit your needs. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/button.html

Inky Callout.description:
Inky Callout 

 Formerly panels, callouts can be used to create sidebar panels or call out important content in an email. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/callout.html

Inky Spacer.description:
Inky Spacer 

 The spacer component will help you create the space you need, the same on every device and client. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/spacer.html

Inky Menu.description:
Inky Menu 

 Use the menu component to create a horizontal or vertical list of links. 

 http://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/menu.html

Inky Menu Item.description:
Inky Menu Item 

 Use the item component to create a link inside a menu component. 

 https://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/menu.html

Inky Center.description:
Inky Center 

 Wraps around any element or component and let Inky handle the magic behind the scenes. 

 https://foundation.zurb.com/emails/docs/alignment.html
